description.value: The data item indicates whether TNM classification is performed during or following multimodality therapy (neoadjuvant radio- and/or chemotherapy prior to surgery). See **y-Prefix of pTNM (Variable number: 4.7)** in \'E A Struktur der Basisdaten.pdf\' (https://www.nicer.org/de/krebsregistrierung/krebsregistrierung-nach-krg-ab-112020/).

definition.value: TNM assigned during or after neoadjuvant therapy.
It cannot be assessed whether TNM was assigned before, during or after therapy.
